item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Soha add a quote by رضوى عاشور
item.description: "الحزن قوة جاذبة تشد لأسفل، تسحب الرأس والكتفين إلى تحت، كأن الجسم في حزنه يُمسي واهناً خفيفاً فتستقوي الجاذبية عليه وتستشرس" -- رضوى عاشور

item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Waiting is painful. Forgetting is painful. But not knowing which to do is the worst kind of suffering." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "If I am really a part of your dream, you'll come back one day." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When you find your path, you must not be afraid. You need to have sufficient courage to make mistakes. Disappointment, defeat, and despair are the tools God uses to show us the way." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everything tells me that I am about to make a wrong decision, but making mistakes is just part of life. What does the world want of me? Does it want me to take no risks, to go back to where I came from because I didn't have the courage to say "yes" to life?" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "On your journey to your dream, be ready to face oasis and deserts. In both cases, don't stop" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Don't give in to your fears. If you do, you won't be able to talk to your heart." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "People are capable, at any time in their lives, of doing what they dream of." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There is no time to leave important words unsaid." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There were two things that prevent us from achieving our dreams: believing them to be impossible or seeing those dreams made possible by some sudden turn of the wheel of fortune, when you least expected it. [...] People want to change everything and, at the same time, want it all to remain the same" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Writing is easy: just stare at the screen of your computer until a tear drops on your keyboard." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Soha add a quote by William Butler Yeats
item.description: "Had I the heavens' embroidered cloths, Enwrought with golden and silver light, The blue and the dim and the dark cloths Of night and light and the half light, I would spread the cloths under your feet: But I, being poor, have only my dreams; I have spread my dreams under your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams." -- William Butler Yeats

item.title: Soha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "None of us knows what might happen even the next minute, yet still we go forward. Because we trust. Because we have Faith." -- Paulo Coelho
